meanings.definition: A garment worn by women in ancient Greece, consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth draped around the body and fastened at the shoulders.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see a beautiful peploses on display.
meanings.sent2: The women in the play wore colorful peploses during the performance.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally tripped on her peploses, causing a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: Her peploses fluttered in the wind like a graceful flag.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the peploses made it a stunning piece of clothing.

meanings.definition: The plural form of peplos, a type of garment.
meanings.sent1: The dancers wore matching peploses for the traditional performance.
meanings.sent2: The exhibit showcased various ancient peploses from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The peploses seemed to multiply magically in the wardrobe.
meanings.sent4: The peploses hung in the room like a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a collection of vibrant peploses.
